statements: SELECT * FROM 3d_model_coordinates;
SELECT id, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, z_coordinate FROM 3d_model_coordinates;
SELECT x_coordinate, y_coordinate, z_coordinate, id FROM 3d_model_coordinates;
SELECT id, x_coordinate FROM 3d_model_coordinates;
SELECT z_coordinate, y_coordinate FROM 3d_model_coordinates;
SELECT id, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, z_coordinate FROM 3d_model_coordinates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT x_coordinate, y_coordinate, z_coordinate FROM 3d_model_coordinates WHERE x_coordinate > 0 AND y_coordinate < 10;
SELECT id, z_coordinate, y_coordinate, x_coordinate FROM 3d_model_coordinates WHERE z_coordinate < 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, z_coordinate FROM 3d_model_coordinates WHERE z_coordinate > 5 ORDER BY x_coordinate ASC, y_coordinate DESC;
SELECT * FROM 3d_model_coordinates WHERE x_coordinate BETWEEN 5 AND 10 AND y_coordinate BETWEEN 0 AND 5 AND z_coordinate BETWEEN 1 AND 4 ORDER BY x_coordinate, y_coordinate DESC, z_coordinate ASC;
SELECT * FROM ModelCoordinates;
SELECT model_id, x_coordinate, y_coordinate FROM ModelCoordinates WHERE z_coordinate > 0;
SELECT simulation_name FROM ARSimulations WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT simulation_id, simulation_name FROM ARSimulations WHERE simulation_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM ModelCoordinates WHERE x_coordinate > 10 ORDER BY y_coordinate DESC;
SELECT model_id, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, z_coordinate FROM ModelCoordinates WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT simulation_id, model_id, simulation_name, simulation_description FROM ARSimulations WHERE simulation_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT simulation_id, simulation_name FROM ARSimulations ORDER BY simulation_id DESC;
SELECT model_id, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, z_coordinate FROM ModelCoordinates WHERE x_coordinate > 10 AND y_coordinate < 5;
SELECT model_id, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, z_coordinate FROM ModelCoordinates WHERE z_coordinate = 0;
SELECT * FROM model_coordinates WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM models WHERE model_id = 2;
SELECT model_id, x_coordinate, y_coordinate FROM model_coordinates WHERE x_coordinate > 0;
SELECT model_id, simulation_date, simulated_by FROM simulations WHERE simulation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT model_id, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, z_coordinate FROM model_coordinates WHERE model_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM models;
SELECT model_id, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, z_coordinate FROM model_coordinates WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT simulation_id, model_name, simulation_date FROM simulations s JOIN models m ON s.model_id = m.model_id;
SELECT model_id, AVG(x_coordinate) AS avg_x, AVG(y_coordinate) AS avg_y FROM model_coordinates GROUP BY model_id;
SELECT model_id, COUNT(simulation_id) AS total_simulations FROM simulations GROUP BY model_id HAVING total_simulations > 5;
SELECT * FROM 3d_model_coordinates;
SELECT model_id, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, z_coordinate FROM 3d_model_coordinates WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT texture_id, texture_name FROM texture_mapping ORDER BY texture_id DESC;
SELECT animation_id, animation_name, duration_seconds FROM animation_metadata WHERE duration_seconds > 10;
SELECT simulation_id, simulation_timestamp FROM ar_simulation_history WHERE model_id = 1 AND animation_id = 2 AND texture_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM 3d_model_coordinates WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT texture_name FROM texture_mapping WHERE model_id = 2 ORDER BY texture_name DESC;
SELECT animation_name, duration_seconds FROM animation_metadata WHERE duration_seconds > 10;
SELECT simulation_id, simulation_timestamp FROM ar_simulation_history WHERE model_id = 3 AND texture_id = 5;
SELECT model_id, AVG(x_coordinate) AS avg_x, AVG(y_coordinate) AS avg_y, AVG(z_coordinate) AS avg_z FROM 3d_model_coordinates GROUP BY model_id HAVING COUNT(model_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM model_coordinates;
SELECT model_name, num_vertices FROM models;
SELECT simulation_name, num_iterations FROM simulations ORDER BY num_iterations DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%';
SELECT device_name AS 'Device Name', device_type AS 'Type' FROM ar_devices;
SELECT * FROM model_coordinates WHERE x_coordinate > 10 ORDER BY y_coordinate DESC, z_coordinate ASC;
SELECT model_id, model_name, num_vertices FROM models WHERE num_vertices >= 100 ORDER BY model_name ASC;
SELECT simulation_name, num_iterations FROM simulations WHERE num_iterations < 500 ORDER BY simulation_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM ar_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC, device_type DESC;
